section.title: Overview
section.para: freeswitch_scripting is a helper module that exposes full control over the FreeSWITCH ESL interface to the Marina.Rodeo script.

It allows the Marina.Rodeo script writer to subscribe to generic FreeSWITCH ESL events as well as to run arbitrary FreeSWITCH ESL commands and interpret their results. It makes use of the freeswitch module for the management of ESL connections and event subscriptions.
Credits for the initial idea and working code samples providing both ESL events and commands go to Giovanni Maruzzelli <gmaruzz@opentelecom.it>.

section.para:
The following modules must be loaded together with this module:
freeswitch
(optional) an SQL DB module

None

section.title: db_url (string)
section.para: An SQL database URL which the module will use in order to load a set of FreeSWITCH ESL sockets and their event subscriptions.

para.emphasis: Default value is NULL (DB support disabled).

section.title: db_table (string)
section.para: The SQL table name for this module.

section.title: db_col_username (string)
section.para: The SQL column name for the "username" ESL connect information.

section.title: db_col_password (string)
section.para: The SQL column name for the "password" ESL connect information.

section.title: db_col_ip (string)
section.para: The SQL column name for the "ip" ESL connect information.

section.title: db_col_port (string)
section.para: The SQL column name for the "port" ESL connect information.

section.title: db_col_events (string)
section.para: The SQL column name for the comma-separated, case-sensitive FreeSWITCH event names which Marina.Rodeo will subscribe to.

section.title: fs_subscribe (string)
section.para: Add a FreeSWITCH ESL URL to which Marina.Rodeo will connect at startup. The URL syntax includes support for specifying a list of events to subscribe to and follows this pattern: [fs://][[username]:password@]host[:port][?event1[,event2]...]

para.emphasis: This parameter can be set multiple times.

section.para: Run an arbitrary command on an arbitrary FreeSWITCH ESL socket. The socket need not necessarily be defined in the database or through . However, if this is the case, then the "password" part of the URL becomes mandatory.

The current Marina.Rodeo worker will block until an answer from FreeSWITCH arrives. The timeout for this operation can be controlled via the esl_cmd_timeout parameter of the freeswitch connection manager module.
Meaning of the parameters is as follows:

listitem.para: command (string) - the ESL command string to execute.
freeswitch_url (string) - the ESL interface to connect to. The syntax is: [fs://][[username]:password@]host[:port][?event1[,event2]...]. The "?events" part of the URL will be silently discarded.
response_var (var, optional) - a variable which will hold the text result of the ESL command.

1 (success) - the ESL command executed successfully and any output variables were successfully written to. Note that this does not say anything about the nature of the ESL answer (it may well be a "-ERR" type of response)
-1 (failure) - internal error or the ESL command failed to execute

section.para: This function can be used from any route.

section.title: fs_subscribe
section.para: Ensures that the given FreeSWITCH ESL socket is subscribed to the given list of events. In case an event cannot be subscribed to, the freeswitch driver will periodically retry to subscribe to it until an fs_unsubscribe MI command for the respective event is issued.
Parameters:

listitem.para: freeswitch_url - the ESL interface to connect to. The syntax is: [fs://][[username]:password@]host[:port][?event1[,event2]...]. The "?events" part of the URL will be silently discarded.
event - the name of the event to subscribe to

section.title: fs_unsubscribe
section.para: Ensures that the given FreeSWITCH ESL socket is unsubscribed from the given list of events.
Parameters:

listitem.para: freeswitch_url - the ESL interface to search for. The syntax is: [fs://][[username]:password@]host[:port][?event1[,event2]...]. The "?events" part of the URL will be silently discarded.
event - the name of the event to unsubscribe from

section.title: fs_list
section.para: Displays the current set of FreeSWITCH ESL sockets and the list of events that the module is subscribed to for each socket.

section.title: fs_reload
section.para: Replaces the current set* of FreeSWITCH ESL sockets along with their respective events with the current data (ESL sockets and their events) found in the "freeswitch" table.
* this includes any sockets/events provisioned through , MI commands or previous DB data set.
This event is raised when Marina.Rodeo receives an ESL event notification from a socket that the "freeswitch_scripting" module is subscribed to.
Parameters:

listitem.para: name - the name of the event
sender - the FreeSWITCH sender IP address
body - the full JSON-encoded body of the event, as sent by FreeSWITCH. Use the json module ($json variable) to easily interpret it.
